en.title: Age Detector
en.text: A computer vision project that predicts human age from facial images using deep learning and CNN-based models. Built with OpenCV and TensorFlow/Keras, the system detects faces and estimates age with real-time visual output for applications in personalization and analytics.

es.title: BrainPulse
es.text: Una API RESTful construida con Node.js, diseñada para el procesamiento de datos de alto rendimiento y la gestión de eventos en tiempo real.

fr.title: BrainPulse
fr.text: Un backend API RESTful construit avec Node.js, conçu pour le traitement de données haute performance et la gestion d'événements en temps réel.

ko.title: BrainPulse
ko.text: Node.js로 구축된 RESTful API 백엔드로, 고성능 데이터 처리 및 실시간 이벤트 처리용으로 설계되었습니다.

en.title: Blackjack
en.text: A console-based Blackjack game built with C#, using object-oriented programming principles like inheritance, polymorphism, and method overriding to simulate real Blackjack gameplay with player and dealer logic.

es.title: MailM8
es.text: Un cliente de correo electrónico multiplataforma construido con Flutter, que ofrece comunicación eficiente y una interfaz intuitiva para la gestión de correos electrónicos.

fr.title: MailM8
fr.text: Un client de messagerie multiplateforme construit avec Flutter, offrant une communication efficace et une interface intuitive pour gérer les e-mails.

ko.title: MailM8
ko.text: Flutter로 구축된 크로스플랫폼 이메일 클라이언트로, 이메일 관리를 위한 직관적인 UI를 통해 효율적인 소통을 제공합니다.

en.title: C++ Calculator App Featuring Scientific Operations
en.text: A custom-built desktop calculator application developed in C++ using wxWidgets. Implements a modular UI with button factories, supports basic and scientific operations (cos, sin, tan), and applies the Singleton design pattern for processing logic. Designed for clear event handling, real-time expression parsing, and dynamic user interaction.

es.title: Stackers
es.text: Una app de productividad con todas las funciones, desarrollada con React Native, que permite a los usuarios organizar tareas, notas y proyectos en varios dispositivos. Ofrece sincronización en la nube, interfaz intuitiva y características de colaboración.

fr.title: Stackers
fr.text: Une application de productivité complète développée avec React Native, permettant aux utilisateurs d'organiser tâches, notes et projets sur plusieurs appareils. Elle offre synchronisation cloud, interface intuitive et fonctionnalités de collaboration.

ko.title: Stackers
ko.text: React Native로 개발된 기능이 풍부한 생산성 앱으로, 사용자가 여러 기기에서 작업, 메모, 프로젝트를 클라우드 동기화와 직관적인 UI로 관리할 수 있습니다.

en.title: HomeFront
en.text: Homefront is a task management and property tracking application built with JavaScript and React to streamline workflows for real estate operations. It features intuitive UI elements for task creation, scheduling, and client management, and utilizes custom algorithms to sort, rank, and highlight property profitability.

es.title: SmartCash
es.text: Un sitio web financiero construido con Next.js, que permite a los usuarios seguir presupuestos y gestionar su dinero con gráficos interactivos e ideas.

fr.title: SmartCash
fr.text: Un site web financier construit avec Next.js, permettant aux utilisateurs de suivre les budgets et de gérer leur argent avec des graphiques interactifs et des analyses.

ko.title: SmartCash
ko.text: Next.js로 구축된 금융 웹사이트로, 사용자가 예산을 추적하고 상호작용하는 차트와 통찰력으로 자금을 관리할 수 있습니다.

en.title: Wine Quality Modeling: Linear & KNN Approaches
en.text: A machine learning project built with Python to predict wine quality using linear regression and K-Nearest Neighbors. Includes feature selection with SelectKBest, evaluation using r² and confusion matrices, and visual diagnostics with Matplotlib and Seaborn.

es.title: Snappy
es.text: Una app de fotografía potente diseñada con Swift para iOS y Android, con controles avanzados de cámara, herramientas de edición y filtros potenciados por IA para mejoras rápidas de fotos.

fr.title: Snappy
fr.text: Une application de photographie puissante conçue avec Swift pour iOS et Android, avec des contrôles avancés de la caméra, des outils d'édition et des filtres IA pour des améliorations rapides des photos.

ko.title: Snappy
ko.text: Swift로 설계된 강력한 사진 앱으로, iOS 및 Android에서 고급 카메라 제어, 편집 도구, AI 기반 필터를 통해 빠르게 사진을 보정할 수 있습니다.

en.title: NLP Analogy Finder
en.text: A Python NLP mini-project using spaCy and cosine similarity to explore word vector relationships through analogy-style queries like 'king - man + woman'.

es.title: Sweet Scoops
es.text: A Python NLP mini-project using spaCy and cosine similarity to explore word vector relationships through analogy-style queries like 'king - man + woman'.

fr.title: Sweet Scoops
fr.text: Un site de recettes construit avec WordPress et WooCommerce, présentant une riche collection de recettes de desserts et une plateforme de commerce électronique intégrée.

ko.title: Sweet Scoops
ko.text: WordPress와 WooCommerce로 구축된 레시피 웹사이트로, 풍부한 디저트 레시피 모음과 통합된 전자상거래 플랫폼을 제공합니다.

en.title: Ref Swapper
en.text: Developed an end-to-end Android app that predicts Premier League match outcomes using machine learning. Integrated TensorFlow and Flask for AI inference, used REST APIs for dynamic data flow, and implemented RecyclerViews with parcelable navigation to display match stats, historical data, and team insights.

es.title: Soccer Analytics
es.text: Una plataforma de análisis deportivo impulsada por IA construida con Python y TensorFlow, que ofrece predicciones detalladas de fútbol y herramientas de gestión de equipos.

fr.title: Soccer Analytics
fr.text: Une plateforme d'analytique sportive alimentée par IA construite avec Python et TensorFlow, offrant des prédictions détaillées pour le football et des outils de gestion d'équipe.

ko.title: Soccer Analytics
ko.text: Python 및 TensorFlow로 구축된 AI 기반 스포츠 분석 플랫폼으로, 축구에 대한 예측 및 팀 관리 도구를 제공합니다.
